resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: [C++][Gandiva] Implement AES ENCRYPT and AES DECRYPT functions

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
See example failed run:
https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/4502485614?check_suite_focus=true

This can be reproduced locally using:
{code}
$ archery docker run fedora-cpp
{code}

About Archery:
https://arrow.apache.org/docs/developers/archery.html

comments.body: cc [~pravindra] [~augustoasilva] Can one of you take a look at this?
